argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | plyadd.1 | |- ( ph -> F e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 2 |  | plyadd.2 | |- ( ph -> G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 3 |  | plyadd.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x + y ) e. S ) |
| 4 |  | plymul.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x x. y ) e. S ) |
| 5 |  | plysub.5 | |- ( ph -> -u 1 e. S ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cnex | |- CC e. _V |
| 7 | 6 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> CC e. _V ) |
| 8 |  | #P_plyf | |- ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) -> F : CC --> CC ) |
| 9 | 1, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> F : CC --> CC ) |
| 10 |  | #P_plyf | |- ( G e. ( Poly ` S ) -> G : CC --> CC ) |
| 11 | 2, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G : CC --> CC ) |
| 12 |  | #P_ofnegsub | |- ( ( CC e. _V /\ F : CC --> CC /\ G : CC --> CC ) -> ( F oF + ( ( CC X. { -u 1 } ) oF x. G ) ) = ( F oF - G ) ) |
| 13 | 7, 9, 11, 12 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( F oF + ( ( CC X. { -u 1 } ) oF x. G ) ) = ( F oF - G ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_plybss | |- ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) -> S C_ CC ) |
| 15 | 1, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> S C_ CC ) |
| 16 |  | #P_plyconst | |- ( ( S C_ CC /\ -u 1 e. S ) -> ( CC X. { -u 1 } ) e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 5, 16 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( CC X. { -u 1 } ) e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 18 | 17, 2, 3, 4 | #P_plymul | |- ( ph -> ( ( CC X. { -u 1 } ) oF x. G ) e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 19 | 1, 18, 3 | #P_plyadd | |- ( ph -> ( F oF + ( ( CC X. { -u 1 } ) oF x. G ) ) e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 20 | 13, 19 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ph -> ( F oF - G ) e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
